code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{auth}from"../firebase";import{signInWithEmailAndPassword}from"firebase/auth";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Login(){const[email,setEmail]=useState("");const[password,setPassword]=useState("");const navigate=useNavigate();const handleLogin=async()=>{try{await signInWithEmailAndPassword(auth,email,password);alert("התחברת בהצלחה!");navigate("/home");}catch(error){console.error("שגיאת התחברות:",error.code,error.message);alert("שגיאת התחברות: "+error.message);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex flex-col items-center justify-center min-h-screen bg-gray-100",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-2xl font-bold mb-4",children:"\u05D4\u05EA\u05D7\u05D1\u05E8\u05D5\u05EA"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",placeholder:"\u05D0\u05D9\u05DE\u05D9\u05D9\u05DC",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),className:"p-2 border rounded mb-2"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"\u05E1\u05D9\u05E1\u05DE\u05D4",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),className:"p-2 border rounded mb-2"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleLogin,className:"bg-blue-500 text-white p-2 rounded hover:bg-blue-600",children:"\u05D4\u05EA\u05D7\u05D1\u05E8"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"mt-4",children:["\u05D0\u05D9\u05DF \u05DC\u05DA \u05D7\u05E9\u05D1\u05D5\u05DF?"," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"/signup",className:"text-green-500",children:"\u05D4\u05D9\u05E8\u05E9\u05DD \u05DB\u05D0\u05DF"})]})]});}export default Login;
